title: My first thought on the Sivir skin teaser...

embed.description: Particularly aimed at League of Legends players, an upcoming mag cover for the new Victorious skin.

body: Because i'm a dumbfuck who accidentally posted this on the gameplay and balance section, i thought i'd share this... AGAIN

replies.body:
page 20: I was alone at bot lane. I had the river bush warded. I thought I was safe, farming away. Most of the enemy team is fighting at mid.  I near their turret.. 

That was when an exclamation mark flew above my head.  He pounced. I used my flash to disappear in the bush disorienting him for a short time, but not long enough, he could smell my fear as I ran as fast as I could. 200 ...   150   80... my HP was dropping..  I finally reached the turret..  I thought he would dive me, then my support shows up, battle scared from mid lane but still healthy enough to save me. 

I owe you my life my friend.
If you could see your health dropping instead of it just disappearing instantly that must be a pretty bad Rengar.
Rest of his team: "RENGAR, STOP PLAYING WITH YOUR FOOD!"

{{champion:19}} "Its only fun when they run."
{{champion:107}} "Damn straight."
*Highfive*
{{champion:203}} What about us? :(

{{champion:203}} Wolf: "Wolves and cat things only, get outta here Lamb"
{{champion:203}} {{item:3070}}
rengar can have sex with adc but graves cant have a cigar wtf just gift me a skin dumbass
I'm surprised you can still use the boards.

I see you a lot o the boards, and I am starting to think someone needs to offer you a, English tutor... or maybe a councilor.

EDIT: Not gonna change the sentence (for my later comment's validity) but I see what Joli is saying now. I gotchu fam.
I really hope you're trolling

> [{quoted}](name=Joli,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=hWEydEyU,comment-id=0001000000020000,timestamp=2015-10-04T15:08:52.218+0000)
>
> I really hope you're trolling

What? I saw him in about eight different threads that day, and not in one of them was there a full sentence without a misspelled word, or a disturbing idea; one that could only come to those who put chocolate milk on their Special K in the morning.
He's asking on how you were trolling because your grammar and spelling to the response was just as bad as his. But now it seems much better.

> [{quoted}](name=kusagari77,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=hWEydEyU,comment-id=000100000002000000020000,timestamp=2015-10-07T02:43:41.672+0000)
>
> He's asking on how you were trolling because your grammar and spelling to the response was just as bad as his. But now it seems much better.

I just noticed - I said "o" not "on". and "a," not "an". 

--->My Point

------------------------------------------------->My Logitech's keyboard's view of my point.
He clearly is if everyone else has seen this guy (I have about 8 times) then I bet riot have. Wonder why he isn't banned yet
This really makes me want a "SURPRISE BUTTSECKS" noise for whenever Rengar pounces...
Plot Twist: You were a fed {{champion:67}} and you proceed to Ult, Tumble and Condemn him to the nearest wall and quickly delete him.

Lol

You actually think Vayne would have time to push a button.
Considering the Vayne managed to Flash before her demise then yes. It clearly shows it there.
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=yW_st2H2Y2Y
Ahh, so this is assuming no one put pink wards down. Got it.

> [{quoted}](name=ninjaIRL ,realm=OCE,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=hWEydEyU,comment-id=00010002,timestamp=2015-10-03T06:47:16.081+0000)
>
> Plot Twist: You were a fed {{champion:67}} and you proceed to Ult, Tumble and Condemn him to the nearest wall and quickly delete him.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=yOGDFOeuVlM

Here,have fun telling us  you're better than him and have god level reaction times.
Well, I assumed there would be pink wards down. :(
Pink wards save people from dying before Rengar even lands.  Today I learned...no, wait, I learned nothing because I died in less than half a second while typing this.

Vayne surviving a fed Regar.  HA!

I've been killed in .32 seconds. Yeah, more than enough time to react.
nothing in this game is more fun than the ult, tumble, condemn combo
Which issue has Taric's Top Tips for keeping your man interested?
you sir get a cookie.    https://sc-events.s3.amazonaws.com/10569/main.jpg

Wait for next month's addition

EDIT: Trust me I'm a writer

Be a pair of explorers, but without a plan.

After all, who needs a map?

{{champion:119}} "Wow, those gladiator tips actually worked!"
http://i.imgur.com/hmoJSqQ.jpg
Hah. ADCs surviving Rengar. Pretty funny.

lol there you go 
<3
Haha thanks <3
What's a New York? Is that a town in Shurima?

> [{quoted}](name=Ligerzz,realm=OCE,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=hWEydEyU,comment-id=,timestamp=2015-10-03T03:56:50.657+0000)
>
> Because i'm a dumbfuck who accidentally posted this on the gameplay and balance section, i thought i'd share this... AGAIN

sorry this doesnt really pertain to ur post its jsut something that bothered me, why does riot delete posts and tell you where they should go instead of just moving them to the right ones? like you had this in gameplay why didnt they just move it to memes and games?

> [{quoted}](name=God Squad Mike,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=hWEydEyU,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2015-10-03T05:44:38.289+0000)
>
> sorry this doesnt really pertain to ur post its jsut something that bothered me, why does riot delete posts and tell you where they should go instead of just moving them to the right ones? like you had this in gameplay why didnt they just move it to memes and games?

The tech that enables moving posts does not currently work.  There isn't currently an ETA for when it will be functional again.
u wot m8
ooomg we need a full magazine of this. it would be so fun.
Very well done =D I really would love to the see Gragas full body workout. I hope it involves lifting  kegs to one's mouth over and over ;)
Sorry to be a wet blanket, but I don't think Maybelline has a magazine (?). Still funny though.
I didn't know that, but thanks for telling me xD.
You sir are brilliant!
i really wish you put "Braums full body workout"
Yeah, Gragas definitely has a dad bod.
Make more of this, pls.
should have been Maybelline bot lane
We need more of this, good job sir!
